description:
AWS::IAM::Group,
AWS::IAM::InstanceProfile,
AWS::IAM::Policy, and
AWS::IAM::Role. If the application contains IAM resources, you can specify either CAPABILITY_IAM or CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM. If the application contains IAM resources with custom names, you must specify CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM. AWS::Lambda::Permission,
AWS::IAM:Policy,
AWS::ApplicationAutoScaling::ScalingPolicy,
AWS::S3::BucketPolicy,
AWS::SQS::QueuePolicy, and
AWS::SNS::TopicPolicy.
